text: Learned about Python JSON manipulation today. It's interesting how we can use Python as a backend for web apps.
Working on integrating JSON with my PWA. The fetch API makes it easy to load external data files.
Successfully added export functionality to my Learning Journal. Users can now download their reflections as JSON files!
Comparing browser storage vs JSON file storage. Each has different use cases - localStorage for temporary data, JSON files for permanent records.
Finalizing Lab 5 requirements. The reflection counter feature helps users see how many entries they've created.
